titles.title: Recognizing the self determination of Gibraltar to determine its status as a British Overseas Territory.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
9/18/2014--Introduced. Honors the contribution that Gibraltar has made to advancing U.S. security interests in the Mediterranean region since 1801.
States that the views and rights of Gibraltarians should always be imperative in any discussion of Gibraltar's status as a British Overseas Territory.
